channel.title: Comments on: We Released Playrock
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: As for sharing on Facebook: 1. We're still aiming for a quiet release. I'm waiting for just a little bit of more content to be there and for the main usability issues to be fixed before I spread the app 2. We suck when it comes to marketing ourselves :)
item.content:encoded:
As for sharing on Facebook:
1. We’re still aiming for a quiet release. I’m waiting for just a little bit of more content to be there and for the main usability issues to be fixed before I spread the app
2. We suck when it comes to marketing ourselves :)

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Great... let me know when you sign into the service. I'll add you to my personal space and I can show you what it's about. I still remember that we went walking outside of the Diligent building and I told about this idea. Who would have thought we'll be where we are today :)
item.content:encoded: Great… let me know when you sign into the service. I’ll add you to my personal space and I can show you what it’s about. I still remember that we went walking outside of the Diligent building and I told about this idea. Who would have thought we’ll be where we are today :)

item.title: By: Roman
item.dc:creator: Roman
item.description: BTW, there's no "share on facebook/.../..." on the PlayRock website. And great name!
item.content:encoded: BTW, there’s no “share on facebook/…/…” on the PlayRock website. And great name!

item.title: By: Roman
item.dc:creator: Roman
item.description: Wow, great news! As soon as i get myself a new phone i am in! (currently using old nokia since my android phone is not with me any more)
item.content:encoded: Wow, great news! As soon as i get myself a new phone i am in! (currently using old nokia since my android phone is not with me any more)
